generated_body: The article titled "The Real Reason McDonald's Keeps the Filet-O-Fish on Their Menu" is likely to explore the strategic and marketing reasons behind the continued presence of the Filet-O-Fish sandwich in McDonald's offerings. Readers may expect insights into consumer preferences, seasonal sales trends, and the sandwich's role in corporate branding, particularly during Lent when fish consumption increases. Additionally, the article could discuss how the Filet-O-Fish compares to other menu items in terms of sales performance and customer loyalty, although this remains speculative.
